name: FrogCroc
description:
Play as the hopping Croc on his adventure which will take him across many arenas filled with foes that it has to defeat. Collect gems and use them to buy various upgrades and new weapons. Fight new enemies as you make your way through. Defeat challenging boss to claim victory!

Shop items:

-Next weapon

-Max health increase

-Speed increase

-Damage increase (This affects your current weapon default damage)

-Fire rate increase (This affects your current weapon default fire rate)

Game does not use text, all information in game is presented with use of icons and bars. Game also uses 4 colours but you can change 2 of them to the one you want.

Game was created for Scribble Game Jam.
